activities: Business Information of our Customers and personal information of Customer's Customers are received and processed as per the service contracts we enter with our Customers.

recoursemech: Hexaware agrees to Cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner FDPIC to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved
